Summary Note:
Peiren Sanders Moens and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Brussels. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Peiren Sanders Moens is a 37 year old Hedge Fund Manager from Belgium.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Peiren Sanders Moens and Chloé have been married since 2017. Peiren and Chloé have 1 child, named Romane.
Education Background:
Peiren finished secondary school at Ecole Secondaire Libre du Sacré-Cœur in 2006.
Peiren pursued higher education at Solvay Brussels School of Economics and Management, graduating in 2011.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 13 years, Peiren Sanders Moens brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
In 2012, Peiren Sanders Moens started working as a Investment Banker at BNP Paribas Fortis SA/NV, marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 2017, he moved to ING Belgium SA/NV to work as a Private Equity Investor, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2021 till now, he served as a Hedge Fund Manager at Euroclear SA/NV, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 100000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has townhouse located in Antwerp, worth 1240000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 830000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned Venture Capitalist, in 2016.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
